General.Name: Les Docks des Pétroles d'Ambès -SA
General.Description: Les Docks des Pétroles d'Ambès -SA engages in the storage and shipping of petroleum products in France. It stores and distributes species, diesel, and combustibles, as well as bio, jet, technical, and marine fuel products. The company was founded in 1930 and is based in Carbon-Blanc, France.
